Apna College Cookie Sync
FileShare Cookie Sync Extension
Seamlessly share your Apna College login sessions.

Welcome!

This page is the companion site for the FileShare Cookie Sync Chrome Extension. The core functionality for sharing and receiving cookie sessions is available directly within the extension popup.

How to Use:

  • Install the FileShare Chrome Extension.
  • Click the extension icon in your browser toolbar to open the popup.
  • Sender: Log in to Apna College, then use the "Export & Share Cookies" button in the extension.
  • Receiver: Open the extension, and if a session is shared, use the "Import Cookies & Login" button.

If you haven't installed the extension yet, please obtain it from the provided source.

FileShare Extension: Making session sharing simple and fast.
Remember: Shared cookie data is temporary and stored in memory on the server.
